tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE expenses (
    expense_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id UUID,
    expense_type VARCHAR(50),
    amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE expenses (
 expense_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 date DATE,
 amount DECIMAL,
 category VARCHAR,
 employee_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
 employee_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 first_name VARCHAR,
 last_name VARCHAR,
 department VARCHAR,
 start_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
 transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 expense_id UUID,
 employee_id UUID,
 date DATE,
 amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE expenses (
    expense_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    expense_date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    position VARCHAR(50),
    hire_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    expense_id INT,
    employee_id INT,
    transaction_date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    payment_method VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE expenses (
  expense_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  description TEXT,
  amount DECIMAL,
  date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  expense_id INT,
  employee_id INT,
  date DATE,
  approved BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE work_expenses (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id UUID,
  expense_type VARCHAR(255),
  amount DECIMAL,
  date DATE,
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  department VARCHAR(255),
  position VARCHAR(255),
  hire_date DATE,
  email VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id UUID,
  expense_id UUID,
  amount DECIMAL,
  date DATE
);
